alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 12:32PM MST until November 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM TUESDAY EVENING TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavier snow returns Tuesday evening. New snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Accumulations of 2 to 4 inches around South Pass with lower amounts in the foothills above Lander and Ft. Washakie. Southwest wind gusting 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 8 PM Tuesday evening to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor enthusiasts should expect the combination of snow and wind to make for difficult travel in the backcountry. The combination of snow and wind is likely to affect travel over South Pass after sunrise Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...After a break in the accumulating snow Tuesday afternoon, the snow intensity increases again Tuesday night and Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
